ComicInfo.Characters: Jack,Jill (a small one from the Farm)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:53:48 [Issue ID 4000-98173] urn:comicvine:4000-98173 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:33:10. [Issue ID 216076]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jack Be Nimble, Part One of Two -- Chapter One: Jack and Jill: Jack and Jill steal a ton of gold and jewels from the Fables treasury, pack a truck and head west.
Chapter Two: The Testimony of Bernard Stein: Jack hires a mentor to teach him about Hollywood and buys a movie studio, changing the name to Nimble Pictures.
Chapter Three: The Testimony of Moss Waterhouse: Jack hires Moss Waterhouse to be the public face of his movie studio and fires Bernie Stein.
Chapter Four: The Testimony of Charlene Speck: Jack lays out to his crew what he wants for a series of fantasy-based movies, and how he wants it.
Chapter Five: Other Testimonials: Jack’s first film, the beginning of a trilogy about the Fable adventures of himself, is set to open with a huge premiere. But will the elusive “Mr. Trick” show up for it?
ComicInfo.Tags: Lilliputians,Jack Be Nimble,Charlene Speck,Moss Waterhouse,Gilda,Bernie Stein,Jill,Jack Horner
ComicInfo.Title: Jack Be Nimble, Part One of Two -- Chapter One: Jack and Jill; Chapter Two: The Testimony of Bernard Stein; Chapter Three: The Testimony of Moss Waterhouse; Chapter Four: The Testimony of Charlene Speck; Chapter Five: Other Testimonials
